129
131
132namespace details {
133
134// Work around the lack of inline variable support.
135template <typename Dummy>
136struct ErrorCategory : std::error_category {
137 [[nodiscard]] auto name() const noexcept -> const char* override {
138 return "Tilt Five Error";
139 }
140
141 [[nodiscard]] auto message(int ev) const -> std::string override {
142 return ::t5GetResultMessage(static_cast<T5_Result>(ev));
143 }
144
145 static const ErrorCategory kSingleton;
146};
147
148template <typename Dummy>
149const ErrorCategory<Dummy> ErrorCategory<Dummy>::kSingleton;
150
151} // namespace details
152
153using ErrorCategory = details::ErrorCategory<void>;
154
155inline std::error_code make_error_code(Error e) noexcept {
156 return {static_cast<int>(e), ErrorCategory::kSingleton};
157}
158
159} // namespace tiltfive
160
161namespace std {
162
163template <>
164struct is_error_code_enum<tiltfive::Error> : true_type {};
165
166} // namespace std
errors.h
C errors for the Tilt Five™ API.
T5_Result
uint32_t T5_Result
Represents an error code that may be returned by the Tilt Five™ API.
